subject: Questions about testing using JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi All, I ve following questions : 1. How do I test an Abstract class using JUnit ? 2. How do I test an Interface using JUnit ? Thank you in advance...
messageBody:
Hi All,

I've following questions :

2. How do I test an Interface using JUnit ?
